data.name: AboutMeText
data.value: I am a hobby developer. A hobby developer, who has made a lot of effort to secure all collected data to the best of his knowledge. No more and no less.

data.name: CopyrightText
data.value: The content, works and information provided on this website are subject to German copyright law and the right to protection of services. Any kind of copying, processing, distribution, storage and any kind of exploitation outside the limits of copyright requires the prior written consent of the respective copyright owner. The unauthorized copying / saving of the provided information on these websites is not permitted and punishable.

data.name: DataProtectionText1
data.value: By visiting the Internet site, information (date, time, page accessed, IP address, UserAgent) is stored via access to the server.

data.name: DataProtectionText2
data.value: If personal data are collected, this is done, if possible, only with the prior consent of the user of the website. The transfer of the data to third parties does not take place without the express consent of the user.

data.name: DataProtectionText3
data.value: The provider points out that the transmission of data on the Internet has security gaps and a complete protection of the data before access by third parties can not be ensured. The provider accepts no liability for the damage caused by such security gaps.

data.name: DataProtectionText4
data.value: The use of contact data by third parties for commercial use is expressly rejected. Unless the provider has previously given his written consent. The provider reserves the right to take legal steps in the event of the unsolicited transmission of advertising information, eg spam mails.

data.name: ExternalLinksText
data.value: The website contains "external links" (links) to other websites, on the contents of which the provider of the website has no influence. For this reason, the provider can not assume any liability for these contents. The respective provider of the linked website is responsible for the content and correctness of the information provided. At the time of linking no infringements were recognizable. If you become aware of such an infringement, the link will be removed immediately.

data.name: LegalText1
data.value: The content of the Internet site was created with the greatest possible care and conscience. However, the provider of this website does not assume any liability for the topicality, completeness and correctness of the pages and content provided.

data.name: LegalText2
data.value: As a service provider, the provider of this website is responsible for its own content and information provided on these pages according to the general laws in accordance with § 7 (1) TMG; According to §§ 8 to 10 TMG, however, is not obliged to monitor the transmitted or stored third-party information. The removal or blocking of these contents takes place immediately from the time of the knowledge of a concrete infringement. Liability is only possible from the time of obtaining the knowledge.

data.name: LinkingText1
data.value: This page allows you to link various user accounts. The IdentityServer is used for this.

data.name: LinkingText2
data.value: In this connection, i.d.R. Information exchanged between this and other service providers. If ever information is shared - this is done exclusively with your own consent.

data.name: SafetyText
data.value: The collected data is stored in a database of my choice. Your password is not stored in the plaintext - but in the form of a secure hash to avoid the compromising of other access data.

data.name: SslText
data.value: I use a free SSL certificate from LetsEncrypt , which encrypts the communication between you and my server.

data.name: UsagedataText
data.value: Registration is possible after registration. After such a registration, all activities of the user (as far as I can reasonably) are stored together with the personal data. (Log)

data.name: UsagedataText3
data.value: (And thus ultimately you and your protection)

data.name: UserDataAdText
data.value: (I will never send e-mails for advertising purposes - e-mails will be used to legitimize and inform the user)

data.name: UserdataListEntry2
data.value: Contact to the user by mail

data.name: UserdataText
data.value: By registering, I collect various user data which I collect exclusively for the following purposes:
